member.name: T:LiteDB.Query
member.summary: Class helper to create query using indexes in database. All methods are statics. Queries can be executed in 2 ways: Index Seek (fast), Index Scan (good)

member.name: F:LiteDB.Query.Ascending
member.summary: Indicate when a query must execute in ascending order

member.name: F:LiteDB.Query.Descending
member.summary: Indicate when a query must execute in descending order

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.All(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all documents using _id index order

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.All(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all documents using field index order

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.EQ(System.String,LiteDB.BsonValue)
member.summary: Returns all documents that value are equals to value (=)

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.LT(System.String,LiteDB.BsonValue)
member.summary: Returns all documents that value are less than value (<)

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.LTE(System.String,LiteDB.BsonValue)
member.summary: Returns all documents that value are less than or equals value (<=)

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.GT(System.String,LiteDB.BsonValue)
member.summary: Returns all document that value are greater than value (>)

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.GTE(System.String,LiteDB.BsonValue)
member.summary: Returns all documents that value are greater than or equals value (>=)

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.Between(System.String,LiteDB.BsonValue,LiteDB.BsonValue)
member.summary: Returns all document that values are between "start" and "end" values (BETWEEN)

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.StartsWith(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all documents that starts with value (LIKE)

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.Contains(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all documents that contains value (CONTAINS)

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.Not(System.String,LiteDB.BsonValue)
member.summary: Returns all documents that are not equals to value

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.In(System.String,LiteDB.BsonArray)
member.summary: Returns all documents that has value in values list (IN)

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.In(System.String,LiteDB.BsonValue[])
member.summary: Returns all documents that has value in values list (IN)

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.And(LiteDB.Query,LiteDB.Query)
member.summary: Returns document that exists in BOTH queries results (Intersect).

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.Or(LiteDB.Query,LiteDB.Query)
member.summary: Returns documents that exists in ANY queries results (Union).

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.ExecuteIndex(LiteDB.IndexService,LiteDB.CollectionIndex)
member.summary: Abstract method that must be implement for index seek/scan - Returns IndexNodes that match with index

member.name: M:LiteDB.Query.Run(LiteDB.CollectionPage,LiteDB.IndexService)
member.summary: Find witch index will be used and run Execute method

member.name: T:LiteDB.BsonMapper
member.summary: Class that converts your entity class to/from BsonDocument If you prefer use a new instance of BsonMapper (not Global), be sure cache this instance for better performance Serialization rules: - Classes must be "public" with a public constructor (without parameters) - Properties must have public getter (can be read-only) - Entity class must have Id property, [ClassName]Id property or [BsonId] attribute - No circular references - Fields are not valid - IList, Array supports - IDictionary supports (Key must be a simple datatype - converted by ChangeType)

member.name: F:LiteDB.BsonMapper._mapper
member.summary: Mapping cache between Class/BsonDocument

member.name: F:LiteDB.BsonMapper._customSerializer
member.summary: Map serializer/deserialize for custom types

member.name: F:LiteDB.BsonMapper.ResolvePropertyName
member.summary: A resolver name property

member.name: P:LiteDB.BsonMapper.SerializeNullValues
member.summary: Indicate that mapper do not serialize null values

member.name: P:LiteDB.BsonMapper.TrimWhitespace
member.summary: Apply .Trim() in strings

member.name: P:LiteDB.BsonMapper.EmptyStringToNull
member.summary: Convert EmptyString to Null

member.name: F:LiteDB.BsonMapper._autoId
member.summary: Map for autoId type based functions

member.name: F:LiteDB.BsonMapper.Global
member.summary: Global instance used when no BsonMapper are passed in LiteDatabase ctor

member.name: M:LiteDB.BsonMapper.RegisterType``1(System.Func{``0,LiteDB.BsonValue},System.Func{LiteDB.BsonValue,``0})

member.summary: Register a custom Auto Id generator function for a type

member.summary: Set new Id in entity class if entity needs one

member.name: M:LiteDB.BsonMapper.Entity``1
member.summary: Map your entity class to BsonDocument using fluent API

member.name: M:LiteDB.BsonMapper.GetPropertyMapper(System.Type)
member.summary: Get property mapper between typed .NET class and BsonDocument - Cache results

member.name: M:LiteDB.BsonMapper.GetIndexFromMapper``1(System.String)
member.summary: Search for [BsonIndex]/Entity.Index() in PropertyMapper. If not found, returns null

member.summary: Serialize a entity class to BsonDocument

member.summary: Serialize a entity class to BsonDocument

member.summary: Deserialize a BsonDocument to entity class

member.summary: Deserialize an BsonValue to .NET object typed in T

member.name: F:LiteDB.DataPage.DATA_RESERVED_BYTES
member.summary: If a Data Page has less that free space, it's considered full page for new items. Can be used only for update (DataPage) ~ 50% PAGE_AVAILABLE_BYTES This value is used for minimize

member.name: P:LiteDB.DataPage.DataBlocks
member.summary: Returns all data blocks - Each block has one object

member.name: M:LiteDB.DataPage.UpdateItemCount

member.summary: If a Index Page has less that this free space, it's considered full page for new items.

member.summary: Get all collections pages

member.summary: Drop a collection - remove all data pages + indexes pages

member.name: T:LiteDB.IndexService
member.summary: Implement a Index service - Add/Remove index nodes on SkipList Based on: http://igoro.com/archive/skip-lists-are-fascinating/

member.name: F:LiteDB.IndexService.MAX_INDEX_LENGTH
member.summary: Max size of a index entry - usde for string, binary, array and documents

member.name: M:LiteDB.IndexService.CreateIndex(LiteDB.CollectionPage)
member.summary: Create a new index and returns head page address (skip list)

member.name: M:LiteDB.IndexService.AddNode(LiteDB.CollectionIndex,LiteDB.BsonValue)
member.summary: Insert a new node index inside an collection index. Flip coin to know level

member.name: M:LiteDB.IndexService.AddNode(LiteDB.CollectionIndex,LiteDB.BsonValue,System.Byte)
member.summary: Insert a new node index inside an collection index.

member.name: M:LiteDB.IndexService.Delete(LiteDB.CollectionIndex,LiteDB.PageAddress)
member.summary: Delete indexNode from a Index ajust Next/Prev nodes

member.summary: Drop all indexes pages

member.name: M:LiteDB.IndexService.GetNode(LiteDB.PageAddress)
member.summary: Get a node inside a page using PageAddress - Returns null if address IsEmpty

member.name: M:LiteDB.IndexService.FlipCoin
member.summary: Flip coin - skip list - returns level node (start in 1)

member.name: M:LiteDB.IndexService.Find(LiteDB.CollectionIndex,LiteDB.BsonValue,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Find first node that index match with value. If not found but sibling = true, returns near node (only non-unique index) Before find, value must be normalized

member.name: M:LiteDB.IndexService.FindBoundary(LiteDB.CollectionIndex,LiteDB.IndexNode,LiteDB.BsonValue,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Go first/last occurence of this index value

member.summary: Insert data inside a datapage. Returns dataPageID that idicates the first page

member.name: M:LiteDB.DataService.Update(LiteDB.CollectionPage,LiteDB.PageAddress,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Update data inside a datapage. If new data can be used in same datapage, just update. Otherside, copy content to a new ExtendedPage

member.name: M:LiteDB.DataService.Read(LiteDB.PageAddress)
member.summary: Read all data from datafile using a pageID as reference. If data is not in DataPage, read from ExtendPage.

member.name: M:LiteDB.DataService.GetBlock(LiteDB.PageAddress)
member.summary: Get a data block from a DataPage using address

member.name: M:LiteDB.DataService.ReadExtendData(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Read all data from a extended page with all subsequences pages if exits

member.name: M:LiteDB.DataService.Delete(LiteDB.CollectionPage,LiteDB.PageAddress)
member.summary: Delete one dataBlock

member.name: M:LiteDB.DataService.StoreExtendData(LiteDB.ExtendPage,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Store all bytes in one extended page. If data ir bigger than a page, store in more pages and make all in sequence

member.name: T:LiteDB.CollectionPage
member.summary: Represents the collection page AND a collection item, because CollectionPage represent a Collection (1 page = 1 collection). All collections pages are linked with Prev/Next links

member.name: F:LiteDB.CollectionPage.MAX_COLLECTIONS_SIZE
member.summary: Represent maximun bytes that all collections names can be used in header

member.summary: Name of collection

member.name: F:LiteDB.CollectionPage.FreeDataPageID
member.summary: Get a reference for the free list data page - its private list per collection - each DataPage contains only data for 1 collection (no mixing) Must to be a Field to be used as parameter reference

member.name: P:LiteDB.CollectionPage.DocumentCount
member.summary: Get the number of documents inside this collection

member.name: P:LiteDB.CollectionPage.Indexes
member.summary: Get all indexes from this collection - includes non-used indexes

member.name: M:LiteDB.CollectionPage.UpdateItemCount
member.summary: Update freebytes + items count

member.summary: Returns first free index slot to be used

member.summary: Get index from field name (index field name is case sensitive) - returns null if not found

member.name: M:LiteDB.CollectionPage.GetIndexes(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns all used indexes

member.summary: Total indexes per collection - it's fixed because I will used fixed arrays allocations

member.name: P:LiteDB.CollectionIndex.TailNode
member.summary: A link pointer to tail node

member.name: F:LiteDB.CollectionIndex.FreeIndexPageID
member.summary: Get a reference for the free list index page - its private list per collection/index (must be a Field to be used as reference parameter)

member.summary: Returns if this index slot is empty and can be used as new index

member.name: P:LiteDB.CollectionIndex.Page
member.summary: Get a reference for page

member.name: M:LiteDB.CollectionIndex.Clear
member.summary: Clear all index information

member.summary: Ignore case? (convert all strings to lowercase)

member.summary: Remove all whitespace on start/end string?

member.name: P:LiteDB.IndexOptions.EmptyStringToNull
member.summary: Convert all empty string to null?

member.summary: Removing accents on string?

member.name: P:LiteDB.DataBlock.Position
member.summary: Position of this dataBlock inside a page (store only Position.Index)

member.name: P:LiteDB.DataBlock.IndexRef
member.summary: Indexes nodes for all indexes for this data block

member.name: P:LiteDB.DataBlock.ExtendPageID
member.summary: If object is bigger than this page - use a ExtendPage (and do not use Data array)

member.summary: Data of a record - could be empty if is used in ExtedPage

member.name: P:LiteDB.DataBlock.Page
member.summary: Get a reference for page

member.summary: Get length of this dataBlock - not persistable

member.summary: Represent a index node inside a Index Page

member.name: F:LiteDB.IndexNode.MAX_LEVEL_LENGTH

member.summary: Position of this node inside a IndexPage - Store only Position.Index

member.summary: Pointer to prev value (used in skip lists - Prev.Length = Next.Length)

member.name: P:LiteDB.IndexNode.Next
member.summary: Pointer to next value (used in skip lists - Prev.Length = Next.Length)

member.name: P:LiteDB.IndexNode.KeyLength
member.summary: Length of key - used for calculate Node size

member.name: P:LiteDB.IndexNode.Key
member.summary: The object value that was indexed

member.name: P:LiteDB.IndexNode.DataBlock
member.summary: Reference for a datablock - the value

member.name: P:LiteDB.IndexNode.Page
member.summary: Get page reference

member.name: M:LiteDB.IndexNode.NextPrev(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns Next (order == 1) OR Prev (order == -1)

member.name: M:LiteDB.IndexNode.IsHeadTail(LiteDB.CollectionIndex)
member.summary: Returns if this node is header or tail from collection Index

member.name: P:LiteDB.IndexNode.Length
member.summary: Get the length size of this node in disk - not persistable

member.name: T:LiteDB.PageAddress
member.summary: Represents a page adress inside a page structure - index could be byte offset position OR index in a list (6 bytes)

member.name: T:LiteDB.ExtendPage
member.summary: Represent a extra data page that contains the object when is not possible store in DataPage (bigger then PAGE_SIZE or on update has no more space on page) Can be used in sequence of pages to store big objects

member.name: P:LiteDB.ExtendPage.PageType
member.summary: Page type = Extend

member.name: P:LiteDB.ExtendPage.Data
member.summary: Represent the part or full of the object - if this page has NextPageID the object is bigger than this page

member.name: M:LiteDB.ExtendPage.UpdateItemCount
member.summary: Update freebytes + items count

member.name: T:LiteDB.CacheService
member.summary: Represent all cache system and track dirty pages. All pages that load and need to be track for dirty (to be persist after) must be added in this class.

member.name: F:LiteDB.CacheService.MAX_CACHE_SIZE
member.summary: Max cache pages size - read or dirty. If Count pass this value cache will be clear on next checkpoint

member.name: M:LiteDB.CacheService.GetPage(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Get a page in my cache, first check if is in my dirty list. If not, check in my cache list. Returns null if not found

member.name: M:LiteDB.CacheService.AddPage(LiteDB.BasePage)
member.summary: Add a page to cache. if this page is in cache, override

member.name: M:LiteDB.CacheService.SetPageDirty(LiteDB.BasePage)
member.summary: Add a page as dirty page

member.name: M:LiteDB.CacheService.CheckPoint
member.summary: Checkpoint is a safe point to clear cache pages without loose pages references. Ex: is callled after each document insert/update/deleted/indexed

member.name: M:LiteDB.CacheService.Clear
member.summary: Empty cache and dirty pages - returns true if had dirty pages

member.name: M:LiteDB.CacheService.GetDirtyPages
member.summary: Returns all dirty pages including header page (for better write performance, get all pages in PageID increase order)

member.name: M:LiteDB.PageService.GetPage``1(System.UInt32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get a page from cache or from disk (and put on cache)

member.name: M:LiteDB.PageService.SetDirty(LiteDB.BasePage)
member.summary: Add a page to cache and mark them as dirty too. Must be marked as dirty BEFORE change page or just after create one

member.name: M:LiteDB.PageService.GetSeqPages``1(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Read all sequences pages from a start pageID (using NextPageID)

member.name: M:LiteDB.PageService.NewPage``1(LiteDB.BasePage)
member.summary: Get a new empty page - can be a reused page (EmptyPage) or a clean one (extend datafile) Set as Dirty

member.name: M:LiteDB.PageService.DeletePage(System.UInt32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Delete an page using pageID - transform them in Empty Page and add to EmptyPageList If you delete a page, you can using same old instance of page - page will be converter to EmptyPage If need deleted page, use GetPage again [Set as Dirty]

member.name: M:LiteDB.PageService.GetFreePage``1(System.UInt32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a page that contains space enouth to data to insert new object - if not exits, create a new Page [Set as Dirty]

member.name: M:LiteDB.PageService.AddOrRemoveToFreeList(System.Boolean,LiteDB.BasePage,LiteDB.BasePage,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Add or Remove a page in a sequence [CAN set "page" and "startPage" as Dirty]
member.param: Indicate that will add or remove from FreeList
Page to add or remove from FreeList
Page reference where start the header list node

member.name: M:LiteDB.PageService.AddToFreeList(LiteDB.BasePage,LiteDB.BasePage,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Add a page in free list in desc free size order

member.name: M:LiteDB.PageService.RemoveToFreeList(LiteDB.BasePage,LiteDB.BasePage,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Remove a page from list - the ease part

member.name: M:LiteDB.PageService.MoveToFreeList(LiteDB.BasePage,LiteDB.BasePage,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: When a page is already on a list it's more efficient just move comparing with sinblings

member.name: T:LiteDB.TransactionService
member.summary: Manage all transaction and garantee concurrency and recovery

member.name: M:LiteDB.TransactionService.Begin(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Starts a new transaction - lock database to garantee that only one processes is in a transaction

member.name: M:LiteDB.TransactionService.Complete(LiteDB.LiteTransaction)
member.summary: Complete transaction commit dirty pages and closing data file

member.name: M:LiteDB.TransactionService.Complete
member.summary: Complete transaction using top transaction

member.name: M:LiteDB.TransactionService.Save
member.summary: Save all dirty pages to disk - do not touch on lock disk

member.name: M:LiteDB.TransactionService.Abort
member.summary: Stop transaction, discard journal file and close database

member.name: T:LiteDB.LazyLoad`1
member.summary: LazyLoad class for .NET 3.5

member.name: T:LiteDB.IndexNotFoundException
member.summary: A specific exception when a query didnt found an index

member.name: F:LiteDB.BasePage.PAGE_SIZE
member.summary: The size of each page in disk - 4096 is NTFS default

member.name: F:LiteDB.BasePage.PAGE_HEADER_SIZE
member.summary: This size is used bytes in header pages 17 bytes (+8 reserved to future use) = 25 bytes

member.name: F:LiteDB.BasePage.PAGE_AVAILABLE_BYTES
member.summary: Bytes avaiable to store data removing page header size - 4071 bytes

member.name: P:LiteDB.BasePage.PageID
member.summary: Represent page number - start in 0 with HeaderPage [4 bytes]

member.name: P:LiteDB.BasePage.PageType
member.summary: Indicate the page type [1 byte] - Must be implemented for each page type

member.name: P:LiteDB.BasePage.PrevPageID
member.summary: Represent the previous page. Used for page-sequences - MaxValue represent that has NO previous page [4 bytes]

member.name: P:LiteDB.BasePage.NextPageID
member.summary: Represent the next page. Used for page-sequences - MaxValue represent that has NO next page [4 bytes]

member.name: P:LiteDB.BasePage.ItemCount
member.summary: Used for all pages to count itens inside this page(bytes, nodes, blocks, ...) [2 bytes] Its Int32 but writes in UInt16

member.name: P:LiteDB.BasePage.FreeBytes
member.summary: Used to find a free page using only header search [used in FreeList] [2 bytes] Its Int32 but writes in UInt16 Its updated when a page modify content length (add/remove items)

member.name: P:LiteDB.BasePage.IsDirty
member.summary: Indicate that this page is dirty (was modified) and must persist when commited [not-persistable]

member.name: P:LiteDB.BasePage.DiskData
member.summary: This is the data when read first from disk - used to journal operations (IDiskService only will use)

member.name: M:LiteDB.BasePage.UpdateItemCount
member.summary: Every page must imeplement this ItemCount + FreeBytes Must be called after Items are updates (insert/deletes) to keep variables ItemCount and FreeBytes synced

member.name: M:LiteDB.BasePage.GetSizeOfPages(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns a size of specified number of pages

member.name: M:LiteDB.BasePage.GetSizeOfPages(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a size of specified number of pages

member.name: M:LiteDB.BasePage.CreateInstance``1(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Create a new instance of page based on T type

member.name: M:LiteDB.BasePage.CreateInstance(System.UInt32,LiteDB.PageType)
member.summary: Create a new instance of page based on PageType

member.name: M:LiteDB.BasePage.ReadPage(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Read a page with correct instance page object. Checks for pageType

member.name: M:LiteDB.BasePage.WritePage
member.summary: Write a page to byte array

member.name: P:LiteDB.HeaderPage.PageType
member.summary: Page type = Header

member.name: F:LiteDB.HeaderPage.CHANGE_ID_POSITION
member.summary: ChangeID in file position (can be calc?)

member.name: F:LiteDB.HeaderPage.HEADER_INFO
member.summary: Header info the validate that datafile is a LiteDB file (27 bytes)

member.name: F:LiteDB.HeaderPage.FILE_VERSION
member.summary: Datafile specification version

member.name: P:LiteDB.HeaderPage.ChangeID
member.summary: Get/Set the changeID of data. When a client read pages, all pages are in the same version. But when OpenTransaction, we need validade that current changeID is the sabe that we have in cache

member.name: F:LiteDB.HeaderPage.FreeEmptyPageID
member.summary: Get/Set the pageID that start sequenece with a complete empty pages (can be used as a new page)

member.name: P:LiteDB.HeaderPage.LastPageID
member.summary: Last created page - Used when there is no free page inside file

member.name: F:LiteDB.HeaderPage.DbVersion
member.summary: Database user version [2 bytes]

member.name: F:LiteDB.HeaderPage.Password
member.summary: Password hash in SHA1 [20 bytes]

member.name: P:LiteDB.HeaderPage.CollectionPages
member.summary: Get a dictionary with all collection pages with pageID link

member.name: M:LiteDB.HeaderPage.UpdateItemCount
member.summary: Update freebytes + items count

member.name: T:LiteDB.ConnectionString
member.summary: Manage ConnectionString to connect and create databases. Connection string are NameValue using Name1=Value1; Name2=Value2

member.name: M:LiteDB.ConnectionString.GetFileSize(System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Get a value from a key converted in file size format: "1gb", "10 mb", "80000"

member.summary: Convert filename to mimetype (http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1029740/get-mime-type-from-filename-extension)

member.name: T:LiteDB.LiteException
member.summary: The main exception for LiteDB

member.name: T:LiteDB.Logger
member.summary: A logger class to log all information about database. Used with levels. Level = 0 - 255 All log will be trigger before operation execute (better for debug)

member.name: E:LiteDB.Logger.Logging
member.summary: Event when log writes a message. Fire on each log message

member.name: P:LiteDB.Logger.Level
member.summary: To full logger use Logger.FULL or any combination of Logger constants like Level = Logger.ERROR | Logger.COMMAND | Logger.DISK

member.name: M:LiteDB.Logger.Write(System.Byte,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Write log text to output using inside a component (statics const of Logger)

member.summary: A StringScanner is state machine used in text parsers based on regular expressions

member.summary: Initialize scanner with a string to be parsed

member.name: M:LiteDB.StringScanner.Reset
member.summary: Reset cursor position

member.name: M:LiteDB.StringScanner.Seek(System.Int32)
member.summary: Skip cursor position in string source

member.name: P:LiteDB.StringScanner.HasTerminated
member.summary: Indicate that cursor is EOF

member.name: M:LiteDB.StringScanner.Scan(System.String)
member.summary: Scan in current cursor position for this patterns. If found, returns string and run with cursor

member.name: M:LiteDB.StringScanner.Scan(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex)
member.summary: Scan in current cursor position for this patterns. If found, returns string and run with cursor

member.name: M:LiteDB.StringScanner.Scan(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Scan pattern and returns group string index 1 based

member.name: M:LiteDB.StringScanner.Match(System.String)
member.summary: Match if pattern is true in current cursor position. Do not change cursor position

member.summary: Match if pattern is true in current cursor position. Do not change cursor position
